Medial prefrontal cortex.Definition: Region of prefrontal cortex comprising the rostral insular cortex and the rostromedial tip of the cingulate gyrus, also referred to as the infrslimbic and prelimbic areas (Kandel et al., Principles of Neural Science, 5th ed., 2013, pg 1072). Medial prefrontal cortex includes parts of Brodmann area 9 in the dorsomedial prefrontal region.
